SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplyDisplayModeButton
This class defines the Apply Display Mode button.
ApplyDisplayModeButtonController
This class controls the Apply Display Mode button.
AppRefresher
This class is an app refresher that gets the application's model, view, controller, and settings manager, and then it re-initializes them.
ButtonThemeUpdater
This class sets the theme for all of the themeable buttons in the view.
ClearAllButton
This class defines the Clear All button.
ClearAllButtonController
This class controls the Clear All button.
ClearHotKeyButton
This class defines the Clear Hot Key button.
ClearHotKeyButtonController
This class controls the Clear Hot Key buttons.
ConnectedDisplaysController
This class controls the active display configuration.
ConnectedDisplaysPoller
This class starts a display configuration updater on a new thread.
Controller
This interface defines a controller.
DhkController
This is the main controller class for the application.
DhkDriver
This class is the main driver for Display Hot Keys that starts the model, view, and controller on the AWT event dispatch thread.
DhkModel
This class is the primary model of Display Hot Keys.
DhkView
This class defines the view for Display Hot Keys.
Display
This class defines the model for a Display.
DisplayConfig
This class gets the current information for the connected displays.
DisplayConfigUpdater
This class provides methods to detect if there was a display configuration change, and if there was, then the settings manager, model, view, and controllers will be re-initialized to reflect the new display configuration.
DisplayModeController
This class controls the Display Mode combo boxes.
DisplayModeInverter
This class inverts a given display mode by swapping the width and height of the resolution.
DpiScaleController
This class controls the DPI Scale Percentage combo boxes.
EnumDisplayIds
This class utilizes the EnumDisplayIds JNI library to retreive the current array of display IDs.
EnumDisplayModes
This class utilizes the EnumDisplayModes JNI library to retreive the current array of supported display modes for a given display.
ExitButton
This class defines the Exit button.
ExitButtonController
This class controls the Exit button.
FrameDragController
This class controls the frame of the application.
FrameUpdater
This class updates the view for Display Hot Keys.
HotKey
This class represents the model for a Hot Key.
HotKeysController
This class controls the hot keys for the application.
Key
This class represents the model for a Key.
KeyText
This class gets the text representation for a given key code.
MenuController
This class adds menu button controllers to the menu controller.
MinimizeButton
This class defines the Minimize button.
MinimizeButtonController
This class controls the Minimize button.
MinimizeToTray
This class enables the application to be minimized to the system tray and restored from the system tray.
MinimizeToTrayButton
This class defines the Minimize To Tray button.
MinimizeToTrayButtonController
This class controls the Minimize To Tray button.
NumberOfSlotsController
This class controls the combo box for the number of active hot key slots.
OrientationController
This class controls the combo box for the orientation of the selected display.
PaypalDonateButton
This class defines the Paypal Donate button.
PaypalDonateButtonController
This class controls the PayPal Donate button.
RefreshAppButton
This class defines the Refresh App button.
RefreshAppButtonController
This class controls the Refresh App button.
RunOnStartupButton
This class defines the Run On Startup button.
RunOnStartupButtonController
This class controls the Run On Startup button.
RunOnStartupManager
This class gets the application's path and uses it to create or destroy a batch file that will run the application on Windows login.
ScalingModeController
This class controls the Scaling Mode combo boxes.
SelectedDisplayController
This class controls the combo box for the selected display.
SetDisplay
This class utilizes the SetDisplay JNI library to immediately apply the given display mode, scaling mode, and DPI scale percentage for the given display.
SettingsManager
This class saves the application settings in an ini file.
SettingsValidator
This class validates all of the property values in the settings file.
Slot
This class represents the model for a Slot.
Slot
This class defines the view components of a Slot.
ThemeButton
This class defines the Theme button.
ThemeButtonController
This class controls the Theme button.
ThemeUpdater
This class sets the theme for the application.
ViewRefresher
This class starts a view refresher on a new thread.
WindowController
This class controls the application's window.
